original_text: While Jesus lived on earth, the Devil tried to make him do wrong things. This caused Jesus to have much pain and trouble. But because of that, he can now help us not to do wrong things. While Jesus lived on earth, the Devil tried to make him do wrong things. This caused Jesus to have much pain and trouble. But because of that, he can now help us not to do wrong things. While Jesus lived on earth, the Devil tried to make him do wrong things. This caused Jesus to have much pain and trouble. But because of that, he can now help us not to do wrong things.
korean_text: 그가 시험을 받아 고난을 당하셨은즉 시험 받는 자들을 능히 도우실 수 있느니라

sentences.original_text: the Devil tried to make him do wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 악마는 그에게 잘못된 일을 하도록 시도했습니다

sentences.original_text: This caused Jesus to have much pain and trouble
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 예수님께 고통과 어려움을 겪게 했습니다

sentences.original_text: he can now help us not to do wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이제 우리가 잘못된 일을 하지 않도록 도와줄 수 있습니다
